Reference

All functions

ApproxCDF()

Numerical Approximation of characteristic function

dDPH() qDPH() pDPH() rDPH() rFullDPH()

The Univariate Discrete Phase-Type Distribution

DPHrep()

Construction of DPH-representation

dMDPH() qMDPH() pMDPH() rMDPH()

The Multivariate Discrete Phase-Type Distribution

dMPH() qMPH() pMPH() rMPH()

The Multivariate Continuous Phase-Type Distribution

dPH() qPH() pPH() rPH() rFullPH()

The Univariate Continuous Phase-Type Distribution

RateMAndStateSpace()

Rate matrix and state space of the block counting process

block_counting_process()

block_counting_process return a the block counting process for a given sample size as a mult_cont_phase_type object.

convph()

Convolution of Continuous Phase-Type Distributions

PH() DPH() MPH() MDPH() summary(<cont_phase_type>) summary(<disc_phase_type>) summary(<mult_cont_phase_type>) summary(<mult_disc_phase_type>)

The phase-type distribution

mean()

mean method for cont_phase_type

moment_mph() moment_mph()

Moments of the multivariate phase-type distribution

phase_type()

Generator Function for Phase-Type Distributions

phase_type_to_network()

Phase-type distribution to network

reward_phase_type()

Transformation of Phase-Type Distributions via Rewards

sim_phase_type()

Phase-type simulations

sim_rew_phase_type()

sim_rew_phase_type implements a naive simulation scheme for simulation of multivariate phase-type distributions.

simple_smoothe()

Simple smoothing

var()

Variance and Covariance of Phase-Type Distributions
